#summary Sleep is part of the AntiCultureWorld project.

Sleep is a [NeedStat need].

==When too low==
The [Entity entity]'s [Integrity integrity] is decreased

==When too high==
Nothing happens, but it means the [Entity entity] spends a lot of time sleeping rather than doing stuff.

==When is it decreased?==
  * With time
  * When some highly demanding operators are used (not sure) 

==When is it increased?==
When the [Entity entity] uses the [Operator operator] [SleepOperator sleep]
